name: The Collective
description:
The Collective are a secret organisation designed to further the lot of mankind. In this case the lot of Martin, a 30 year old office drone with nothing better to do.

One day he finds a file on his computer - a file that will change his life forever. Can you find the right path in this classic text adventure game to see Martin through to join the Collective?

CONTROLS

  • If there is no response from the keyboard touch the game screen with the mouse to activate the game
  • Just type the relevant numbers on your keyboard as they come up
